"Adding Special Abilities":
"You can use the Item Lab's \"Add Special Abilities\" function to add Special Abilities to your equipment.

To add Special Abilities, you need Special Ability Capsules and N-Meseta to use as materials."

"You can obtain Special Ability Capsules as drops from enemies in Exploration Sections, or by trading for them at the Upgrade Material Exchange section of the Item Lab.

In addition, Dread Enemies and Gigantix drop particularly powerful Special Ability Capsules."

"There are various kinds of Special Ability Capsule, which each allow you to add different Special Abilities.

If you use only one Special Ability Capsule, the odds of the procedure succeeding may be low. You can use multiple Special Ability Capsules of the same type at once to raise the success rate."
